app.name: Wii Trouble
app.long_description:
Tank Trouble-esque multiplayer game, specifically inspired by a web-based game called Josh Trouble (creator unknown) which can be found here: https://tinyurl.com/joshtrouble
Controls: (Point + A) Select (1) Shoot (2) Move forwards (D-Pad) Turn (+) Main menu (Home) Exit to loader
Music: Frank Klepacki - Hell March
